DOC.brief_summary: The current study dubble-blinde placebo-controlled cross-over study verify preventive effect antioxidant noise-induced hearing loss ( NIHL ) noise-induced tinnitus ( NIT ) . The antioxidant comprise mixture magnesium n-acetylcystein take 1h leisure noise 100dB least 30 minute .
